function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Overcrowding due to reservation system limitations","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proximity of lockers, toilets, and change booths may increase the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity of individuals in the swimming pool and jacuzzi areas
